revision.text:
<languages/> {{Infobox dungeon |name = Autel Abondance |image = [[File:Abundant Shrine.png|300px]] |caption = Une carte de l'Autel Abondance. |tokens = 306 500 |location = Unys Route 14 }} '''L'Autel Abondance''' est un [[Dungeons|donjon]] d'[[Unova|Unys]]. Il a initialement 81 cases arrangées en 9x9, comprenant 9 coffres, 21 rencontres hors boss et 1 case de Combat de Boss. Les rencontres sauvages ont 4 803 000 PV.
==Tables des rencontres==
===Rencontres sauvages===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Pokémon sauvages !! colspan=2| Dresseurs |- ! Rencontre !! Dresseur !! Équipe Pokémon |- | [[File:Vulpix.png|40px]] Goupix || rowspan=2|[[File:Youngster.png|40px]] Wes Gamin || rowspan=2|[[File:Skorupi.png|40px]] Rapion, [[File:Seviper.png|40px]] Séviper |- | [[File:Golduck.png|40px]] Akwakwak |- | [[File:Marill.png|40px]] Marill || rowspan=3|[[File:Twins.png|40px]] Rae & Ula Jumelles|| rowspan=3|[[File:Swablu.png|40px]] Tylton, [[File:Swablu.png|40px]] Tylton |- | [[File:Azumarill.png|40px]] Azumarill |- | [[File:Swablu.png|40px]] Tylton |- | [[File:Bronzor.png|40px]] Archéomire|| rowspan=3|[[File:Lass.png|40px]] Lurleen Fillette || rowspan=3|[[File:Deerling_(Spring).png|30px]] Vivaldaim (Printemps), [[File:Zangoose.png|40px]] Mangriff |- | [[File:Cottonee.png|40px]] Doudouvet |- | [[File:Petilil.png|40px]] Chlorobule |- | [[File:Goldeen.png|40px]] Poissirène|| rowspan=3|[[File:Youngster.png|40px]] Jaye Gamin || rowspan=3|[[File:Karrablast.png|40px]] Carabing, [[File:Shelmet.png|40px]] Escargaume, [[File:Joltik.png|40px]] Statitik, [[File:Scolipede.png|40px]] Brutapode |- | [[File:Basculin (Red-Striped).png|40px]] Bargantua (Motif Rouge) |- | [[File:Basculin (Blue-Striped).png|40px]] Bargantua (Motif Bleu) |}
